name: 陳振誠
objective:
本課程主要在教導學生探討基本室內環境品質與人體健康間的關係，使學生具備創造健康室內環境的相關知識及操作能力，主要授課要點如下：
1.以各種類型的建築室內環境為主題；
2.探討人為環境與人體健康之關係；
3.探討建築材料、構造與設備對室內環境各項因子之影響；
4.學習室內環境品質量測儀器之操作與判讀能力；
5.具備診斷與改善一般室內環境議題之相關專業知識及操作能力。
The purpose of this course is to discuss the relationship between Indoor Environment Quality and human healthy, and make sure our students can realize the knowledge of healthy environment and manage it.
Contents：
1. The indoor environment of different types of building.
2. The relationship between the artificial environment and human health.
3. Discuss the influence of the building material, construction and equipment on indoor environment.
4. Learn to use the instrument to measure indoor environment quality.
5. Learn to diagnose and improve indoor environment quality.
